1.0.name: wordpress/buddypress-friends
1.0.description: This plugin adds a widget to Buddypress that displays the friends for the current user that is logged in. They are displayed as Avatar images or as a list of your friends. You can easily resize the avatar images and control how many of your friends display in the widget. This plugin will be expanding to include a lot more features including sorting friends in different manners.
